html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-04682016-06-10,  ,  ,  INAC, 
ActMackenzie Valley Resource Management Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Mackenzie Valley Land Use Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the MACKENZIE VALLEY LAND USE REGULATIONS in order to (1) Provide consistency with the provisions of the Act; (2) address discrepancies between the French and English versions of the Regulations, clarify imprecisions and ambiguities and address inconsistencies with the Act; (3) reflect current departmental policies on fees and security which were identified through an internal review of the Regulations; (4) reflect provisions of the Déline Final Self-Government Agreement Act; and (5) update the “Information in Support of an Application for a Land-Use Permit” Form.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0128 Publication Date: 2016-06-29
AttachmentsAttachment
